text: Bellocco is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Giuseppe Bellocco (born 1948), Italian gangster of the Bellocco 'ndrina * Gregorio Bellocco (born 1956), Italian gangster of the Bellocco 'ndrina * Umberto Bellocco (born 1937), Italian gangster of the Bellocco 'ndrina == See also == * Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Bellocco
